div.div: Welcome to the Elk Mound Area School District Opening Minds for Life’s Journey
Helping our youth become responsible citizens who seek to contribute to our society in positive ways

a.title: Slide Number 1 - HOME of the Mounders

li.a: Slide Number 1 - HOME of the Mounders

img.alt: Slide Number 1 - HOME of the Mounders

div.p: Welcome to the Elk Mound District web page. We are pleased that you have taken the time to explore the information that is found on this site. The school district has a proud tradition of excellence in educating our youth. We are proud of both our academic and extra-curricular successes.

p.span: Check out more 8th grade science work on adaptations. #mounderpride #EMMS
Ms. Stoiber had a Virtual chat with 6th period science class. Madison L. drew a bird. #mounderpride #EMMS

REMINDER: We will provide an instructional material pick-up tomorrow (Wednesday) from 2:00 p.m. – 6:00 p.m. Items not picked up will be delivered by our bus drivers on Thursday, April 23. Not all HS...
